definition: palace/temple/castration (as corporal punishment)/first note in pentatonic scale
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite

sentences.english: Melodious tunes, gaze into the endless desolation under the cope of specious ages.
sentences.chinese: 宫调溶溶，谛观浮华岁月的无尽苍凉。

definition: pre-Tang names of the five notes of the pentatonic scale, corresponding roughly to do, re, mi, sol, la
tuning (stringed instrument)/(fig.) to make up one's mind

five notes of pentatonic scale, roughly do, re, mi, sol, la/five classes of initial consonants of Chinese phonetics, namely: 喉音[hou2 yin1], 牙音[ya2 yin1], 舌音[she2 yin1], 齒音|齿音[chi3 yin1], 唇音[chun2 yin1]
traditional Chinese musical notation using Chinese characters to represent musical notes
a note on a musical scale
(music) accidental (a note foreign to the key signature)
tone mark on a Chinese syllable (i.e. accents on ā á ǎ à)/(music) key signature
